page.title: 18KNUTSFORD'S MOTORWAY PATROL
page.content: The Motorway patrol covers the M6 and the M56.There are 42 men aged from 18 to 54. They have 16 landrovers, 2 are kept at the Knutsford Police station and the other 14 are kept at the Knutsford Motorway Service station. They go out to about 8 accidents a day but the most that they have gone out to in one day is 15. 'Flying doctors' usually come out to major accidents. The biggest crash they have had was 111 vehicles, over forty people died and around forty seven were injured. In the back of the landrovers there are 12 cones which are red and white, there are 4 slow signs, 2 arrow signs and 10 flashing lights. Knutsford Motorway patrol have the only Chemical Protection gear and mask and oxygen tank in the U.K.Inside the landrover is a breathalyser & powerful radio.
